text: Renal cell carcinoma is a type of renal cancer (cancer of the kidneys). If it is found early, it can often be cured. However, if the cancer has already spread to other parts of the body, it is much more difficult to treat successfully. == Signs and symptoms == * Pain in the the sides of the body) * Weight loss * Fever * Blood in the urine * A mass that can be felt through the skin In bad cases, patients may also have symptoms of metastasis (symptoms in other parts of the body where the cancer has spread) Category:Medicine Category:Cancer C Category:Renal cancer
title: Renal cell carcinoma
